value:
Everywhere you look...you see selfish
people without a care in the world.
Bah, it makes me sick.

Gatrie always comes to me for advice.
Bah... He's so hopeless. But I can't
seem to get rid of him.

Worrying is a luxury. Unless you've
struggled so hard you cried yourself
dry. Go ahead and worry then.

Stop. My bow is for protection only.
I'm not gonna be hunting for sport.

I don't know what your expectations
of me are so I'll be direct: I'm a merc,
not a member of your fellowship.

I am a mercenary, not an errand boy.
But here's a message from your
friend $Nf.

I fight to live. That's all. Doesn't
everyone? It's not like people kill
each other for fun.

This mission is like shooting
apples off a tree. Let's finish
this and get out of here.
Damn... You're making me angry...

Well... I don't have any regrets
about this.

I'm a mercenary named Shinon.
If you turn out to be untrustworthy,
I won't hesitate to nock an arrow.$k$pYou have been warned.

Watch out! ...Sheesh, lucky for you,
my arrow found its mark. Try to keep
focused, $Nu...$k$pDo you expect everyone here to
protect you at all costs? What a cozy
status to have, O great summoner.$k$pA stark contrast to the disposable
mercs and ordinary soldiers. I wonder
what other fancy treatment you get!$k$pSorry. Forget that. I've just dealt with
far too many black-hearted nobles
and useless generals in my time.$k$pBut still, as a mercenary, I couldn't let
my employer die before me. It'd leave
a stain on my conscience. That's all.
そらっ
はいよっと！
ぐっ…
You...!
Like shooting apples off a tree.
My arrows will find you!
Let's see how you handle this.
So dull!
What a stupid way to live...
Heh
A single arrow, right between the eyes? Who else could make a shot like that?
Stop being a fool. Are you a child?
Rolf has what it takes. He trains the right way, and he'll surpass both his brothers.
Ike pretends to have no interest in anything but ends up taking everything.
You may be my friend, but if there's gold on the table, I'll take you down. That's what it means to be a mercenary.
It's not like people kill each other for fun. I fight to live. That's all.
Out of the goodness of my heart, I'll teach you how adults fight. You can thank me later.
We finally agree!
What have we here?
No problem at all.
